Method Detail

sendQMessage

void sendQMessage(NodeVariable x,
                  NodeFunction f,
                  MessageQ value)
Takes a message Q from x to f and it's value. It can be stored in a local enviroment or sent to the agent.

Parameters:
x - the NodeVariable that is the origin of the message
f - the NodeFunction that is the receiver of the message
value - the value of the message

sendRMessage

void sendRMessage(NodeFunction f,
                  NodeVariable x,
                  MessageR value)
Takes a message R from f to x and it's value. It can be stored in a local enviroment or sent to the agent.

Parameters:
f - the NodeFunction that is the origin of the message
x - the NodeVariable that is the receiver of the message
value - the value of the message
